pages.title: Peacock Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Indian peacock softshell turtle ($(o)Nilssonia hurum$()) is a species of turtle found in South Asia, and is listed on the IUCN Red List as a vulnerable species.

pages.title: Peacock Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
